title: Sip Or Spill: We Can't Believe What Bert Just Took A Gulp Of!
description:
We took a page out of “Real Housewives” creator Andy Cohen’s book from his late-night talk show, “Watch What Happens Live.” We ended playing a game Plead The Fifth.
We're given five tough questions to answer, and we’re only allowed to skip ONE – a.k.a. “Pleading the Fifth.” But today, we're switching the game up a bit. Instead of pleading, we have to sip something very disgusting!
Bert's in the hotseat this morning! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
